content.text:
# Draft:Eromosele Edward Ozah

Eromosele Edward Ozah (known professionally as Eronxshaddy) is a Nigerian beauty and special-effects (SFX) makeup artist. He is best known for pioneering the style of BeautySFX and for attempting a Guinness World Record for the longest makeup application marathon.
Early life and education
Eromosele Ozah was born in Edo State, Nigeria. He studied [field, e.g., Agriculture] at the University of Benin (UNIBEN), where he began practicing makeup artistry. Ozah is largely self-taught, starting his craft by experimenting with his mother’s makeup kit and improvised materials.
Career
Ozah started his career as a student makeup artist at the University of Benin. His creative blend of beauty and special effects makeup gained public attention after his Zipper Girl look went viral on social media in 2019.
He later branded his work as BeautySFX, combining glamour makeup with horror-style special effects.  His artistry has been featured in https://www.albument.com/2021/02/interview-with-incredible-ozah_94.html?m=1.
In 2023 he dives into the influencer marketing space And runs a marketing agency called InfluMark limited. He does this because he believed he could make significant difference by helping influencers build their brands and grow their career and also get the best deals for them. Currently he’s diversified into agriculture and he is the founder of Green livestock Africa limited
Guinness World Record attempt
In [year], Ozah applied to the Guinness World Records for the longest makeup application marathon.  After multiple applications, he was eventually approved, and carried out the marathon at [location], lasting approximately 28 hours, 49 minutes, and 43 seconds.  The attempt drew support from the Edo State government and was covered in [reputable sources].
Recognition
* Featured in [insert newspaper, magazine, or online publication].
* Recognized by the Edo State government for his Guinness World Record attempt.
* Viral social media success with over [21M impression ] views/likes on major platforms.
Personal life
[He got married july 25th 2025 to Dr Victory Oyeindoubra Ogbe. He is currently an in influencer marketer]
References
External links
